java.util.Set<SbbEntityID> getSortedSbbAttachmentSet(java.util.Set<SbbEntityID> excludeSet)
get an ordered copy of the set of SBBs attached to this ac. The ordering is by SBB priority.

Returns:
list of SbbEIDs

isEnding

boolean isEnding()
test if the activity context is ending.

Returns:
true if ending.

removeNameBinding

boolean removeNameBinding(java.lang.String aciName)
Add the given name to the set of activity context names that we are bound to. The AC Naming facility implicitly ends the activity after all names are unbound.

Parameters:
aciName - -- name to which we are bound.
Returns:
true if name bind was removed; false otherwise

newValue - -- value of the shared data item.
